The claim attributes a quote to special: stating, "We must move as quickly as possible to a one-world government; a one-world religion; under a one world leader."
The quote was found in a Facebook post p: alongside a picture of Mueller speaking. The post was flagged as part of Facebook's efforts to combat false news and misinformation.
Multiple websites: such as Twitter and me.me, have similar posts attributing the quote to Mueller. However, no legitimate sources could be found to confirm that Mueller actually said it.
While there are sources attributing a si: with one "e"), a former assistant secretary-general for the United Nations, there is no credible citation or confirmation that he made the statement either. The United Nations did not respond to inquiries about the quote's authenticity.
